import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import "./MyCart.css"; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; function MyCart (){ const [num, setNum]= useState(1); const increaseNum =()=>{ if(num<10) { setNum(Number(num)+1); } }; let decreaseNum = () => { if(num>0) { setNum(num - 1); } } let handleChange = (e)=>{ setNum(e.target.value); } return(
